text:
="preserve">The "Zomi Baptist Church" is a christian believer church. In India the Zomi Baptist Church (ZBC) was established in 1982.
The ZBC headquarters is at Champhai, India. In Myanmar the ZBC is known as ZBCM (Zomi Baptist Church in Myanmar). Nowadays the ZBC is also present in the United States (Tulsa) and other countries in the world.
